snippet: Roberto Bautista Agut of Spain upset fourth-seeded Tomas Berdych of the Czech Republic, 4-6, 6-2, 6-4, in the second round of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif.
abstract: Roberto Bautista Agut upsets fourth-seeded Tomas Berdych in the second round of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif.
lead_paragraph: Roberto Bautista Agut of Spain upset fourth-seeded Tomas Berdych of the Czech Republic, 4-6, 6-2, 6-4, in the second round of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif.
